segments.text: Oh no, the sink is overflowing, water everywhere on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman has no idea, she's just polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's already wet, she could slip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those poor kids, the boy's stool looks like it's about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies, but one wrong move and he'll fall hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, so close to the danger too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hate seeing this, it's all so precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting soaked, that can't be good for the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, everything's calm, but inside it's a disaster waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to yell and stop this before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart's racing just watching them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why hasn't she turned around yet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR
